data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos Laguna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio TSM Corona.
San Luis have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards San Luis a goal kick.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
San Luis will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santos Laguna.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
In the minute 8, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
In the minute 11, Santos Laguna pushes forward through Julio Furch, whose finish on goal is saved.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
San Luis push upfield but Eduardo Galvan Basulto quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 13, Alan Cervantes is booked for the home team.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 15, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a San Luis throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Walter Sandoval for Santos Laguna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 20, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards San Luis a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
In the minute 23, Eduardo Aguirre of Santos Laguna smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Santos Laguna.
Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 25, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Walter Sandoval scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio TSM Corona.
Great play from Bryan Garnica to set up the goal.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Santos Laguna.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to San Luis.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 30, German Berterame equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Anderson Julio with an assist there.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 32, Can San Luis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos Laguna's half?
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of San Luis.
Camilo Mayada for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 34, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for San Luis, close to Santos Laguna's area.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna's David Andrade breaks free at Estadio TSM Corona. But the strike goes wide of the post.
San Luis have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 41, Santos Laguna are coming forward and Hugo Rodriguez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio TSM Corona.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in San Luis's half.
The first-half has come to a close in Torreon.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 51, At Estadio TSM Corona, German Berterame has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a penalty...
It's advantage Santos Laguna in Torreon as Julio Furch scores from the spot to make it 2-1.
In the minute 56, Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Free kick San Luis.
Pablo Barrera of San Luis gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 59, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio TSM Corona.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 60, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Santos Laguna are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 62, The home team replace Bryan Garnica with Carlos Orrantia.
Guillermo Vazquez is making the team's first substitution at Estadio TSM Corona with Pablo Lopez replacing Juan Castro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to San Luis.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ventura Alvarado (San Luis) has received a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Eduardo Aguirre with Santiago Munoz. This is the second substitution made today by Jorge Guillermo Almada.
Matias Catalan is replacing Mauro Quiroga for San Luis at Estadio TSM Corona.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Diego Pineda is replacing Anderson Julio for the away team.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to San Luis.
In the minute 83, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Jorge Guillermo Almada (Santos Laguna) is making a third substitution, with Ronaldo Prieto replacing Walter Sandoval.
In the minute 85, San Luis have a dangerous throw-in.
In Torreon San Luis attack through German Berterame. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Dionicio Escalante (San Luis) has received a yellow card from Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 88, Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a San Luis throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick in a good position for Santos Laguna!
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio TSM Corona.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
